item.title: US Non-residential Construction Contractors by Trade
item.description: Tables This is a brief summary with R code of latest tables for contractor types by US regions. Retrieval of data from US Bureau of Labor Statistics using blsAPI library. # install_github("mikeasilva/blsAPI") library(blsAPI) # library(ggplot2) library(dplyr) library(plotly) payload <- list( 'seriesid' = c( "PCU236400236400" , "PCU2364002364001" , "PCU23640023640011" , "PCU23640023640012" , "PCU23640023640013" , "PCU23640023640014" , "PCU236400236400221" , "PCU2364002364002211" , "PCU2364002364002212" , "PCU2364002364002213" , "PCU2364002364002214" , "PCU236400236400222" , "PCU2364002364002221" , "PCU2364002364002222" , "PCU2364002364002223" , "PCU2364002364002224" , "PCU236400236400223" , "PCU2364002364002231" , "PCU2364002364002232" , "PCU2364002364002233" , "PCU2364002364002234" , "PCU236400236400224" , "PCU2364002364002241" , "PCU2364002364002242" , "PCU2364002364002243" , "PCU2364002364002244" ) , 'startyear' = 2010 , 'endyear' = 2030 , 'registrationKey' = mykey ) response <- blsAPI(payload, 2, return_data_frame = TRUE) response2 <- response response2$seriesID <- as.
